column5: Just took a walk down to the lock in Lindsay and the walleye are in spawning if anyone wants to have a look. No carp or suckers to be seen. Seems they brought the water up just in time.
They been spawning off my dock last couple nights under the ice patches was watchin males during afternoon cruising for females lets hope they hold levels for next 10-14 days
Good to hear the eyes aren't going to be in trouble after those alarming pictures seen at the dams. Did anyone here go pick baits from the ground when the water was low?
My favourite time of the year. Always used to love seeing em spawn at the locks.

They been spawning off my dock last couple nights under the ice patches was watchin males during afternoon cruising for females lets hope they hold levels for next 10-14 days All the females are in Lindsay!
